messages.title: A better plan, A better future
messages.content: I believe being an MP is a full-time job with no outside business interests. I will always put Telford's interests first.

issues.health: David has always been a strong supporter of our local health services.

housing.content: David is a good man who has helped regenerate local businesses, worked to get the £12 million flood and erosion protection schemes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Resident, I've lived in Telford all of my life and I'm very proud to have served you in the parliament for the last 14 years...

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped thousands of constituents with their problems, working to improve the A&E at Princess Royal and the set-up of new businesses.

endorsements.endorsement: As a young family, we know how much the Labour Council in Telford has achieved in the best start for our children.
David is a good man who has helped regenerate local businesses, worked to get the £12 million flood and erosion protection schemes.
David is a strong supporter of local businesses and an advocate of local education, transformation and regeneration for the benefit of the Telford community.
I have known David before he became the MP for Telford and he has always been a strong supporter of our local health services.

quotes.text: I've lived in Telford all my life and it's been a great privilege to serve you.

images.caption: Re-Elect David Wright From Telford For Telford ELECTION COMMUNICATION
